entry.title: ROSE 声明CUDA类型的变量
entry.content:
问题

需要声明CUDA类型的变量，如 constant,device,shared等等

解决方案

调用get_declarationModifier().get_storageModifier().set

entry.title: error: no instance of overloaded function "tex1Dfetch" matches the argument list argument types are: (texture<double, 1, cudaReadModeElementType>, int)
entry.content:
问题

在使用cuda的纹理存储器时，编译器报错 bash stencilexample.cu(147): error: no instance of overloaded function "tex1Dfetch" matches the argument list argument types are: (texture<double, 1, cudaReadModeElementType>, int)

解决方法

经过研究，发现原来cuda的纹理存储器不能直接支持double

出处：cuda-c-programming-guide

``` The type of a texel, which is restricted to the basic integer and single-precision floating-point types and any of the 1-, 2-, and 4-component vector types defined in char, short, int, long, longlong, float, double that are derived from the basic integer and single-precision floating-point types.

```
